about_the_game:
Stefan Levin is now available as a new playable character in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions.

A Swedish promising midfielder, with a penetrating insight to determine others' abilities and splended techniques to fool the opponents.

He visits America as a member of the Sweden soccer observation team to analyze the participating countries.

A kind young man who loves soccer and his sweetheart.
detailed_description:
Stefan Levin is now available as a new playable character in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions.

A kind young man who loves soccer and his sweetheart.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-650 | AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTS 450, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 6970, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 37 GB available space
